title: E-commerce Platform Redesign
description: Led full-stack redesign of e-commerce platform, improving checkout conversion by 32% and reducing page load time by 58%.
longDescription: Spearheaded a complete architectural overhaul of a legacy e-commerce platform serving 50K+ daily users. Implemented React Server Components for improved performance, integrated Stripe for secure payments, and built a custom CMS for product management. The redesign resulted in a 32% increase in checkout conversion rate and 58% reduction in page load time.
challenges: Migrating from legacy monolith to modern architecture
